title: Editing
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interviewing
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Editing
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
description: Episode of Series "On camera: the BBC video production course". Two versions of an item about a factory that has introduced morning exercises for its workers. Shows how the same material can be edited in different ways to change the shape of the story. There is also a demonstration of how interviews can be edited to greatest advantage and how shots can be juxtaposed to make the best use of materials.
related_objects: Series; S01166; On camera: the BBC video production course; Active; 1984
